thought.text: Let me check if I can work around this by directly importing the modules I need:

action.command: cd /tmp/tmpr5a8owwj/astropy && python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); from astropy.timeseries import TimeSeries; print('TimeSeries imported successfully')"

function.arguments: {"command": "cd /tmp/tmpr5a8owwj/astropy && python -c \"import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '.'); from astropy.timeseries import TimeSeries; print('TimeSeries imported successfully')\"", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: execute_bash
